Class Disease

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Disease
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Disease
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Diseases reduce crew member health and can be cured
    Author:
    Cameron Stevenson
    See Also:
